sourcesContent: import { Flex, Input, Text, Box, Button, Img } from '@chakra-ui/react' import cardMobile from './images/cards-mobile.png' import cardDesktop from './images/bg-card-front.png' function App() { // return ( {/* 1 */} cardholder name {/* 2 */} cardholder name {/* 3 */} {/* exp date */} exp. date (mm/yy) {/* cvc */} cardholder name ) } export default App
